resources.string:
The book for the entrance preparation is out now in the market, this book contains the all the old questions and model question which are designed according to the TU entrance syllabus.

The main features of the book are listed below 
1. Math Formulas 
2. Grammar Formulas 
3. Physics Important Key 
4. Chemistry Important Reactions 
and many more..... 

If you want to get the book, Please contact Gopal Nepal (9849665162), the marketing manager of the book or go to the Thamel Books locates right infront of the Amrit Campus.
